    title: 'Audio',
    subtitle: 'The Audio component is used to embed sound content in websites & applications.',
    description:
        'The Audio component may contain one or more audio sources, represented using the src prop & is a thin wrapper around the native audio element.',
}

```tsx
import { Audio, AudioWaveform } from "@fold-ui/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => {
    return (<Audio style={{ maxWidth: 400 }} width="100%" loader muted controls srcs={[
            {
                src: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/42/Bird_singing.ogg',
                type: 'audio/ogg',
            },
        ]}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => {
    return (
        <Audio
            style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}
            width="100%"
            loader
            muted
            controls
            srcs={[
                {
                    src: 'https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/42/Bird_singing.ogg',
                    type: 'audio/ogg',
                },
            ]}
        />
    )
}
```
### Waveform

> The Waveform Audio component enables a richer, more platform agnostic interface to the audio component.

export const Waveform = () => {
    return (<Card style={{ maxWidth: 400 }} width="100%" p={20} column>
            <AudioWaveform defaultProgress={0.5} width="100%" height={30} samples={100} strokeWidth={2} src={{
            src: '/song.ogg',
            type: 'audio/ogg',
        }}/>
        </Card>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Waveform />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Waveform.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Waveform = () => {
    return (
        <Card
            style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}
            width="100%"
            p={20}
            column>
            <AudioWaveform
                defaultProgress={0.5}
                width="100%"
                height={30}
                samples={100}
                strokeWidth={2}
                src={{
                    src: '/song.ogg',
                    type: 'audio/ogg',
                }}
            />
        </Card>
    )
}
```
### Flatten

export const Flatten = () => {
    return (<Card style={{ maxWidth: 500 }} width="100%" p={20} column>
            <AudioWaveform flatten defaultProgress={0.5} width="100%" height={30} samples={100} strokeWidth={2} src={{
            src: '/song.ogg',
            type: 'audio/ogg',
        }}/>
        </Card>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Flatten />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Flatten.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Flatten = () => {
    return (
        <Card
            style={{ maxWidth: 500 }}
            width="100%"
            p={20}
            column>
            <AudioWaveform
                flatten
                defaultProgress={0.5}
                width="100%"
                height={30}
                samples={100}
                strokeWidth={2}
                src={{
                    src: '/song.ogg',
                    type: 'audio/ogg',
                }}
            />
        </Card>
    )
}
```
### Custom Pin Height

export const CustomPinHeight = () => {
    return (<Card style={{ maxWidth: 500 }} width="100%" p={20} column>
            <AudioWaveform style={{ '--f-audio-waveform-pin-height': '5rem' }} width="100%" height={70} samples={100} strokeWidth={2} src={{
            src: '/song.ogg',
            type: 'audio/ogg',
        }}/>
        </Card>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<CustomPinHeight />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="CustomPinHeight.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const CustomPinHeight = () => {
    return (
        <Card
            style={{ maxWidth: 500 }}
            width="100%"
            p={20}
            column>
            <AudioWaveform
                style={{ '--f-audio-waveform-pin-height': '5rem' }}
                width="100%"
                height={70}
                samples={100}
                strokeWidth={2}
                src={{
                    src: '/song.ogg',
                    type: 'audio/ogg',
                }}
            />
        </Card>
    )
}
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
